sentences.en: A large study found that among patients admitted to the hospital for a heart attack, women were far less likely than men to get angiography to find vessel blockages or angioplasty to clear them.

sentences.en: Angioplasty and coronary artery bypass surgery are two common procedures used to treat angina.

sentences.en: Simply put, angioplasty DOES offer better results within the first 3 years after the operation.

sentences.en: Stents improved the procedure by combating the tendency of many vessels to reclose quickly after angioplasty.
sentences.cn: 而支架技术的出现由于可以减少血管成形术后的血管再狭窄,从而使介入操作更进一步.
